name: Fake Call Video Cat Joke
description:
Fake Video Call Cat Joke - Do you love your cat? Or I would like you to have a virtual cat?
Play your friends and loved ones, show them a false video call!
Pretend that you have to communicate by video conferencing with a cat!
The more you interact with seals, the more points you get!
Accumulate a lot of coins and open all the beautiful and cute seals!
Gather your collection of pets!
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Call Video.
Leave us feedback and evaluation and we will make our game even better! Thank you for playing our apps!
